mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(wd_date, 1, 2) AS "year", SUBSTR(wd_date, 4, 2) AS "month", count(*) AS "cnt" FROM WITHDRAW group by SUBSTR(wd_date, 1, 2), SUBSTR(wd_date, 4, 2) order by "year" asc, "month" asc
SELECT SUBSTR(regdate, 1, 4) AS "year", SUBSTR(regdate, 5, 2) AS "month", count(*) AS "cnt" FROM member group by SUBSTR(regdate, 1, 4),SUBSTR(regdate, 5, 2) order by "year" asc, "month" asc
